mapper.select: select log.*, user.nickname operator_user_name from sys_sdc_operate_log log left join sys_user user on log.operator_user_id = user.user_id where log.sys_status = 1 order by if(isnull(log.modified_time),0,log.modified_time) desc,log.created_time desc

select log.*, user.nickname operator_user_name from sys_order_operate_log log left join sys_user user on log.operator_user_id = user.user_id where log.sys_status = 1 order by if(isnull(log.modified_time),0,log.modified_time) desc,log.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_sdc_operate_log ( operate_log_id, operate_type, operator_user_id, operate_content, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{operate_type}, #{operator_user_id}, #{operate_content}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )

insert into sys_order_operate_log ( operate_log_id, operate_type, operator_user_id, operate_content, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) values ( uuid(), #{operate_type}, #{operator_user_id}, #{operate_content}, #{creator_id}, now(), now() )
